mapper.insert: insert into bus_product (product_name, product_twodimecode, type_, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, remark_, enable_) values (#{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productTwodimecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{enable,jdbcType=BIT})
mapper.update: update bus_product set product_name = #{productName,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, product_twodimecode = #{productTwodimecode,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, type_ = #{type,jdbcType=CHAR}, create_time = #{createTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, create_by = #{createBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, update_time = #{updateTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, update_by = #{updateBy,jdbcType=INTEGER}, remark_ = #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, enable_ = #{enable,jdbcType=BIT} where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id_, product_name, product_twodimecode, type_, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, remark_, enable_ from bus_product where id_ = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
select id_, product_name, product_twodimecode, type_, create_time, create_by, update_time, update_by, remark_, enable_ from bus_product
